hero.title: Your Trusted Partner for Electronic Repairs
hero.subtitle: Fast, Reliable, and Affordable Services for All Your Gadgets.

hero.title: About Rakesh Electronics
hero.subtitle: Dedicated to providing exceptional electronic repair services and premium appliances with over a decade of expertise and commitment to quality.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a vision to make electronic repairs accessible and reliable, Rakesh Electronics has been serving the community for over 10 years. What started as a small repair shop has grown into a trusted name in electronics services.
story.paragraph2: Our journey began with a simple mission: to provide honest, affordable, and high-quality repair services for all electronic devices. Over the years, we've expanded our expertise to include premium appliances and cutting-edge technology solutions.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to have completed over 1000 successful repairs while maintaining our commitment to customer satisfaction and technological excellence.

values.title: Our Mission & Vision
values.subtitle: Guided by our core principles and commitment to excellence in electronic services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide reliable, affordable, and professional electronic repair services while ensuring customer satisfaction through quality workmanship and honest practices. We strive to extend the life of electronic devices and reduce electronic waste.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading electronics service provider in the region, known for innovation, reliability, and exceptional customer service. We envision a future where technology serves everyone seamlessly.

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: The principles that drive everything we do at Rakesh Electronics.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on the quality of our repairs and services.

reliability.title: Reliable Service
reliability.description: Consistent, dependable service you can trust every time.

trust.title: Trust & Honesty
trust.description: Building lasting relationships through transparent and honest practices.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Staying ahead with the latest technology and repair techniques.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The skilled professionals behind our exceptional service quality.

founder.name: Rakesh Sharma
founder.description: With over 15 years of experience in electronics repair, Rakesh leads our team with expertise and passion for technology.

technicians.name: Expert Technicians
technicians.description: Our certified technicians specialize in various electronic devices and stay updated with the latest repair techniques.

support.name: Customer Support
support.description: Our dedicated support team ensures smooth communication and excellent customer experience throughout the repair process.

hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive range of premium fans, electrical appliances, and accessories for your home and office needs.
